short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refreshes pages automatically with customizable intervals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reloader is a powerful and easy-to-use Chrome extension that automatically refreshes web pages at customizable intervals. Whether you need to monitor live updates, track stock prices, follow news feeds, or stay updated on social media, Reloader ensures you never miss a beat.

With a sleek, compact design, Reloader allows you to set custom refresh times for each tab, giving you full control over your browsing experience. The extension includes features like pause/resume functionality, real-time status tracking, and a visual countdown badge that alerts you when a refresh is imminent.

Managing multiple pages is a breeze with the intuitive options page, where you can easily add, edit, and delete refresh tasks. Ideal for professionals, traders, and anyone who relies on up-to-the-minute information, Reloader is your go-to tool for staying ahead of the curve.

Install Reloader today and streamline your workflow with automated, reliable page refreshes!
